definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Among them, the personal firewall (PFW) software is the best choice for personal users.
sentences.chinese: 其中个人防火墙软件是个人用户的最佳选择。

sentences.english: Inside the firewall, there is no anonymity.
sentences.chinese: 在防火墙内部，没有匿名机制。

sentences.english: The complexity of a jerry-rigged firewall will undermine its effectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 一个偷工减料的防火墙，其复杂性将削弱其效力。

sentences.english: These clouds exist within the company firewall and they are managed by the enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 这些云在公司防火墙之内，由企业管理。

sentences.english: Firewalls allow for enforcement of the domain encapsulation.
sentences.chinese: 防火墙允许增强对域的封装。

sentences.english: Filtering firewalls are more or less transparent to the user.
sentences.chinese: 过滤防火墙对于用户或多或少是透明的。

sentences.english: Again, though, all in the context of firewalling time to make things.
sentences.chinese: 然而再一次，这是我们穿越防火墙的时机。

sentences.english: If we get another fw for the 5800, then great.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们得到的另一个5800防火墙，那也不错。

sentences.english: You’ll need to Unblock or Accept any firewall prompts.
sentences.chinese: 需要解锁或接受任何防火墙提示。

sentences.english: Update all non-Microsoft firewall and other security software on your computer.
sentences.chinese: 更新所有非微软的防火墙和其它安全软件在计算机上。

sentences.english: Setting up multi-level firewalls is one example of building a defense mechanism layer.
sentences.chinese: 建立多级防火墙是构建防御机制层的一个例子。

sentences.english: The integration did not require any special firewall or security considerations.
sentences.chinese: 该集成不需要考虑任何防火墙或安全问题。

sentences.english: This is much more true if you are yourself firewalled or behind a router.
sentences.chinese: 这点会更加明显当你处于路由器和防火墙之后时。

sentences.english: The Inter-Zone firewall is being disabled. Please hold…
sentences.chinese: 区域间防火墙正在关闭，清稍后。

sentences.english: This document describes a protocol for the application-layer traversal of IP network firewalls.
sentences.chinese: 本文档描述了一个应用层上的ip网络防火墙协议。

sentences.english: A firewall is like the moat surrounding a castle.
sentences.chinese: 防火墙就象是城堡边上的护城河。

definition: network router/gateway (to Internet or between networks)

pinyin: xu1 ni3 zhuan1 yong4 wang3 luo4
